items.sentence: They say Tom is the best player on the team.
Why aren't Tom and Mary doing that together?
Tom's explanation wasn't easy to understand.
I'm not sure that that would be a good idea.
Do you think Tom and Mary will do that soon?
Tom said that he was going to shoot himself.
I can't promise that I'll be there tomorrow.
I can't play the piano as well as I used to.
Have you been diagnosed with a heart murmur?
Please step up here, then sit on this table.
Things didn't go the way Tom wanted them to.
How do you psych yourself up before matches?
I'll have another cup of coffee after lunch.
The living are more important than the dead.
I speak a little French, but I'm not fluent.
It isn't likely that I would change my mind.
Did you really understand everything I said?
You won't be able to keep Tom from drinking.
I like to sing, but I'm not very good at it.
Tom probably isn't ever going to walk again.
